short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new beginning for reaction content!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(This extension was made for a video on my channel: DHMelon)

Not all content creators want their videos to be reacted to, for people making the reaction videos however, it's simply not possible to ask every single creator if they can react to their content.

But what if the reactors could know if the creator allowed reactions on a certain video the moment they click on it? Now with Melon's ReactHub, that's possible.

After you allow your content to be reacted to or not from the extension, anyone using the extension will now view your videos title in the corresponding color.
